name: Siege Resilience Leadership
description: Psychological endurance reps for commanders shepherding crews through weeks of degraded sensors and radiation alerts.

cards.title: Radiation Calm Brief
cards.description: Deliver a five-minute morale brief that balances honest radiation sensor data with actionable mitigation steps.
cards.summaryText: Leaders own the tone when the dosimeter alarms go off.

cards.title: System Triage Board
cards.description: Prioritize subsystem recovery actions using a simple red/amber/green board everyone can see.
cards.summaryText: Visible triage boards steady crews because they can see the plan.

cards.title: Sleep Discipline Coach
cards.description: Rebuild a circadian-friendly duty roster after two weeks of constant alerts.
cards.summaryText: Morale dies when sleep debt isn't actively managed under siege.

cards.title: Degraded Comms Storytelling
cards.description: Craft a short SITREP narrative crews can repeat verbatim when sensors are blind and rumors spike.
bulletpoints: State facts, gaps, and next checks
cards.summaryText: Rumor control is a leadership rep when telemetry dries up.

cards.title: Contingency Mentor Circles
cards.description: Facilitate 15-minute peer circles to surface stress indicators and quick wins.
cards.summaryText: Micro-retros keep morale from collapsing between ops briefs.

cards.title: After-Action Emotional Sweep
cards.description: Immediately after a high-stress event, lead a structured emotional sweep to normalize responses and reset focus.
cards.summaryText: Commanders must clear emotional residue before the next contact report.
